thread.title: Phil Jones talks up Manchester United's fighting qualities as he targets top four finish
thread.title_full: Phil Jones talks up Manchester United's fighting qualities as he targets top four finish

author: David McDonnell
title: Phil Jones talks up Manchester United's fighting qualities as he targets top four finish
text:
Phil Jones talks up Manchester United's fighting qualities as he targets top four finish The Red Devils defender has been discussing the transitional period since Sir Alex Ferguson left Old Trafford Share Jones has been discussing United's run in (Photo: AFP)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Phil Jones says Manchester United’s players will “fight” all the way to secure a top-four finish this season. 
United moved out of sixth spot for the first time in 184 days with Sunday’s 3-1 win at Middlesbrough, boosting their hopes of a top-four finish. 
Jose Mourinho was missing key players including Zlatan Ibrahimovic , Paul Pogba and Ander Herrera, with defender Jones claiming the win showed the willingness of United’s players to fight for each other. 
And while Mourinho has claimed he would rather win the Europa League than finish fourth, Jones said United’s players had shown their determination to push for a top-four finish with Sunday’s win. 
“We’ve got strength in depth in the squad and it showed,” said Jones. Jones believes United can crack the top four (Photo: Manchester United) 
“When we’ve dropped points so has everyone else and when we’ve won so has everyone else, so that’s why we’ve been in same position for so long. 
“But for us it doesn’t matter. We just concentrate on every game and we are up to fifth now. 
“It shows the fight in the squad - not literally - but it shows we’re prepared to fight for each other. 
“You can’t buy that. It’s in everyone. It rubs off on us from the manager. 
“It’s all about a willingness to win and fight for each other. Whatever formation we play or the tactics we play, ultimately it’s about the fight in every player and we’re showing that at the moment.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
